title: CAFWCL : Edo Queens bag N500m for reaching semi - final
body_text:
Sport
CAFWCL: Edo Queens bag N500m for reaching semi-final
Edo Queens have claimed a whopping sum of N500 million for reaching the semi final of the CAF Women’s Champions League.
The Nigeria Women Football League, (NWFL), champions defeated South-Africa’s Mamelodi Sundowns 2-1 on Saturday.
Edo Queens finished top of Group B with seven points from three games.
Egyptian side FC Masar finished as runners-up in the group.
Moses Aduku’s side will face TP Mazembe of Congo Democratic Republic in the semi-final.
Hosts AS FAR and FC Masar will clash in the other last four tie.
